name: In Search of the Frisbee Tribe
name_original: In Search of the Frisbee Tribe
description:
[Created for the "Roll The Dice" game jam.]

A game about a spaceman crash landing on planet Frisb and trying to find his way home.

I used a random game title generator and got "In Search of the Frisbee Tribe" so went with it.

The game is very very short and mainly a concept of a story that could be longer but I hope you enjoy it either way.

Controls
ENTER - Start
Z - A Button
X - B Button
